```{r}

library(scales)
library(reshape2)
setwd("C:/RAHUL/NEU/VISUALIZATION/HOMEWORKS/Homework3")

df_airdelay<-read.csv("airlines_delay.csv")
PlotFunc<- function(DF)
{
  df_air_1<-df_airdelay %>% select(carrier_delay,late_aircraft_delay,nas_delay,security_delay,weather_delay) %>% drop_na()
  delay_long=gather(df_air_1)
  p<-ggplot(DF, aes(x =value, fill=key)) +
       geom_density(alpha=0.5)+scale_x_log10(breaks = trans_breaks("log10", function(x) 10^x),
              labels = trans_format("log10", math_format(10^.x)))+ggtitle("Density plot of carrier delays in mins")+xlab("log delay in mins")+ylab("Density")
                                                                                                
p
}

PlotFunc(delay_long)                                       
```
